about_the_game:
NokNok: A Cross-Platform Idle Game

Welcome to NokNok, a revolutionary cross-platform open world idle game that combines the excitement of autonomous world-building with the ease of idle gaming. As a player, you can earn coins and treasure chests by simply hanging out, and use these rewards to unlock various rare types of hammers. These hammers will help you accelerate your battle power, allowing you to take on and defeat the mighty bosses that stand in your path.

Key Features:
- Cross-platform gameplay: Play NokNok on any device and platform of your choice.
- Open world exploration: Discover and roam in a vast, immersive world at your own pace.
- Idle mechanics: Earn coins and treasure chests even while you're away or offline.
- Rare hammers: Collect unique hammers from treasure chests to enhance your battle power.
- Hammer upgrades: Use your hard-earned coins to level up your hammers and increase their strength.
- Epic boss battles: Challenge and defeat powerful bosses to progress through the game.
- Self-governance: As you progress, take on the responsibility of governing your own community within the game world.

Join the world of NokNok today and start your idle adventure in an open world where your actions shape the society around you!
